name: damascene/database-backup
description: This is just a small CLI app which will create a backup from your database

suggest.league/flysystem: Required to use the remote backup with S3 or Dropbox (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (~1.0).
suggest.spatie/flysystem-dropbox: Required to use the Flysystem Dropbox driver (~1.0).
